duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the global quality audit related activities, including preparing audit schedules, communicating with audited functions, coordinating discretional audits, and leading audit execution.
Develop, update, and perform quality compliance training, and maintain centralized quality compliance related information for audits, inspections, and regulatory product registration.
Establish, organize, consolidate, and maintain files, records, and communication with regulatory agencies, and stay informed of applicable quality system regulations/standards.
Serve as a project manager for driving projects/initiatives and working with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with quality systems regulations/standards.
Contribute to developing, editing, or revising quality system processes and collaborate with cross-functional team, and mentoring team members as required.
Provide updates to management on the status of the Quality Compliance program, and comply with applicable laws and regulations, adhere to Quality Management System processes and requirements.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree or equivalent combination of education and experience, and valid quality auditor certification by a recognized organization.
